name: @lf2com/knob.js
description: Knob tells the degree you spin. And let you know the degree of knob starts from center-top and positive value for clockwise

scripts.build-debug: browserify index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] > knob.min.js
scripts.build: browserify index.js -t [ babelify --presets [ es2015 stage-0 ] ] | uglifyjs -cm > knob.min.js

author: Wan Wan
